myCases.title: My Cases
myCases.noAddedCases: You haven't added any cases yet,
myCases.noPendingCases: You have no pending test cases

introduce.description: A professional test management platform designed to systematically verify whether software systems meet specifications and user requirements.
introduce.planTesting: Coordinate and organize testers to conduct testing activities through comprehensive "Test Plans";
introduce.reviewCases: Facilitate test case reviews to identify potential defects and errors early in the development cycle;
introduce.reportAnalysis: Provide comprehensive reporting and analysis of health, progress, and issue trends.

list.noPlans: You haven't added any plans yet,
list.planDeleteSuccess: Plan deleted successfully, you can view the deleted plan in the recycle bin
list.permissionControlOnTips: After enabling "Permission Control", you need to manually authorize service permissions to have plan operation permissions. Permission control is enabled by default. Note: If the authorized object does not have parent project permissions, view permissions will be automatically granted.
list.permissionControlOffTips: After enabling "No Permission Control", all users will be allowed to publicly view and operate the current plan. Users viewing the plan must also have parent project permissions for the current plan.

introduce.title: About Test Plan
introduce.description: Test plans serve as the core component of the software testing lifecycle, providing a systematic framework for testing teams. Through detailed test planning, we ensure organized testing activities, improve efficiency and quality, while reducing project risks.

testScope.title: Define Test Scope
testScope.description: Define functional and business test scenarios, avoid omissions and redundancy.

timeManagement.title: Time Planning Management
timeManagement.description: Create test schedules, arrange phase timelines, ensure on-time project delivery.

riskManagement.title: Risk Identification
riskManagement.description: Identify risk factors affecting test progress and quality.

communication.title: Team Collaboration
communication.description: Establish communication mechanisms, avoid confusion from unclear duties.

continuousImprovement.title: Continuous Optimization
continuousImprovement.description: Through plan execution and review, optimize testing processes and methods.

standards.title: Quality Standards Definition
standards.description: Establish quality assessment criteria and test pass requirements.

notifications.planDeleteSuccess: Plan deleted successfully, you can view the deleted plan in the recycle bin

form.planNamePlaceholder: Plan brief description, up to 200 characters
form.ownerTooltip: By setting the owner of the plan, the responsibility and rights of testing can be clearly defined, which can better promote the completion of tasks and progress control, such as: solving problems, advancing progress, collaborating with team members, identifying and managing risks, etc.
form.timePlanTooltip: Determine the start and end times of the test activity to ensure that all tests are completed within the project cycle.
form.testersTooltip: Clearly define the testers participating in this test plan, only allowing testers to participate in test activities. Determine the role of the tester, the scope of the test, or the test tasks and test cases to be executed, to avoid responsibility ambiguity and task omissions.
form.reviewTooltip: After enabling, the team can evaluate the quality and effectiveness of test cases, test steps, and test results through the review process, and only after the test case review is passed can it enter the test, which is enabled by default.
form.reviewCloseConfirm: After disabling, the test case review status will be automatically cleared (excluding review count), confirm whether to continue?
form.workloadAssessmentTooltip: Specify the workload assessment method. The work hour is the actual time spent by each person to complete a work, calculated in hours; the story point is an evaluation value based on the workload, complexity, and other factors of the work task, which can force the team to subdivide problems in the task, with flexible and agile characteristics, recommended to use.
form.casePrefixTooltip: After setting, the case name under the plan will start with this prefix and cannot be modified.
form.attachmentsTooltip: Other documents, such as: requirements specification, reference materials, system architecture diagram, test specifications, technical documents, etc. Supported formats: "jpg","bmp","png","gif","txt","docx","jpeg","rar","zip","doc","xlsx","xls","pdf"; up to 10 attachments can be uploaded.
form.testingObjectivesPlaceholder: Define the specific content and scope of the test activity, including which functions and modules need to be tested, which platforms and versions need to be tested, etc.
form.testingScopePlaceholder: Define the specific content and scope of the test activity, including which functions and modules need to be tested, which platforms and versions need to be tested, etc.
form.acceptanceCriteriaPlaceholder: Clearly define the specific conditions and standards for the delivery of the software product.
form.otherInformationPlaceholder: Other information, such as test strategy, risk assessment, and management, etc.

permissionModal.title: Plan Permission
permissionModal.onTips: After enabling "Permission Control", you need to manually authorize service permissions to have plan operation permissions. Permission control is enabled by default. Note: If the authorized object does not have parent project permissions, view permissions will be automatically granted.
permissionModal.offTips: After enabling "No Permission Control", all users will be allowed to publicly view and operate the current plan. Users viewing the plan must also have parent project permissions for the current plan.

functionCase.title: Use Case
functionCase.confirmDeleteCase: Are you sure you want to delete case 「{name}」?
functionCase.confirmDeleteSelectedCases: Are you sure you want to delete the selected cases?
functionCase.deleteSuccess: Deleted successfully, you can view the deleted case in the recycle bin

addCaseModal.preconditionHint: All conditions or environment configurations that need to be met before test execution.
addCaseModal.enterPrecondition: Enter precondition, supports up to 2000 characters.
addCaseModal.testStepsHint: Specific operation steps and expected results to be taken when executing test cases, as criteria for pass/fail judgment.
addCaseModal.descriptionHint: Overall supplementary explanation and background introduction of test cases to help understand the purpose, scope and expected results of testing.
addCaseModal.priorityHint: Priority is used to identify the importance and urgency of cases. Use high priority for important, real-time, or cases that may block other activities.
addCaseModal.storyPointsHint: Assessment value of work task volume, comprehensive difficulty, and complexity.
addCaseModal.workHoursHint: Time spent on work assessment, calculated in hours.
addCaseModal.minMaxDecimal: Minimum 0.1, maximum 1000, supports up to 2 decimal places
addCaseModal.actualStoryPointsHint: Actual value of work task volume, comprehensive difficulty, and complexity.
addCaseModal.actualWorkHoursHint: Actual time spent on work, calculated in hours.
addCaseModal.deadlineHint: Case deadline cannot exceed test plan deadline.
addCaseModal.deadlineMustBeFuture: Deadline must be a future time
addCaseModal.tagsHint: Used for classification and quick retrieval, supports up to 5 associations.
addCaseModal.descriptionTooLong: Description content too long (maximum 2000 characters), please reduce content
addCaseModal.fileTooLarge: Upload file or text size exceeds 100MB, please upload again
addCaseModal.aiGenerateHint: Generate function cases through AI intelligence to improve case writing efficiency

failReasons.caseNameNotClear: Case name description is not concise and clear.
failReasons.caseDesignInconsistent: Case design is inconsistent with requirements, test is invalid.
failReasons.missingPrerequisites: Missing necessary prerequisites, may cause inability to execute normally.
failReasons.stepAccuracyInsufficient: Case step accuracy and correctness are insufficient, cannot execute and verify accurately.
failReasons.descriptionUnclear: Case description is not clear enough, has ambiguity or vagueness.
failReasons.incompleteCoverage: Case does not cover all function points and scenarios, has omissions.
failReasons.boundaryUnclear: Case test boundary definition is not clear enough.
failReasons.priorityUnreasonable: Priority arrangement is unreasonable, may affect test efficiency and effectiveness.
failReasons.logicInconsistent: Logical relationship with other cases is inconsistent or has conflicts.

updateCaseResultModal.testResultOrProcess: Test result or process description, maximum 200 characters

uploadCase.title: Import Cases
uploadCase.uploadDescription: You can drag files directly into this area for upload. File size should not exceed 20M, supports .xls .xlsx file types.

mainView.confirmDeleteCase: Are you sure to delete case 「{name}」?
mainView.confirmDeleteSelectedCases: Are you sure to delete selected cases?
mainView.deleteSuccess: Delete successful, you can view deleted cases in recycle bin

moduleTree.confirmDeleteModule: Are you sure to delete module 「{name}」?

kanbanView.caseNotReviewed: Case not reviewed, cannot modify test result
kanbanView.caseReviewFailed: Case review failed, cannot modify test result
kanbanView.canOnlyMoveToPending: Can only move to pending test
kanbanView.canOnlyMoveToTestResults: Can only move to test passed, test failed, or canceled
kanbanView.confirmDeleteCase: Are you sure to delete case 「{name}」?
kanbanView.caseDeleteSuccess: Case deleted successfully, you can view deleted cases in recycle bin
kanbanView.resetTestResultTip: Update case to 'Pending Test', related statistics and status will be cleared.

assocCase.title: Associated Cases
assocCase.associateCaseTip: "Associated Case" are used to establish relationships between different cases for easy management and traceability. Cases that can establish associations include: dependent cases, extended cases, same functionality cases, key functionality cases, etc.

infoAttachment.title: Attachments
infoAttachment.fileSizeTip: Single file size cannot exceed {size}M, maximum 5 files

infoBasic.title: Basic Information
infoBasic.evalWorkloadPlaceholder: Min 0.1, max 1000, up to 2 decimal places
infoBasic.actualWorkloadPlaceholder: Min 0.1, max 1000, up to 2 decimal places
infoBasic.evalWorkloadTip: Assessment value for work tasks, comprehensive difficulty, complexity, etc.
infoBasic.evalWorkloadTipTime: Time spent on work assessment, calculated in hours.
infoBasic.actualWorkloadTip: Actual value for work tasks, comprehensive difficulty, complexity, etc.
infoBasic.actualWorkloadTipTime: Actual time spent on work, calculated in hours.

infoDate.title: Date
infoDate.deadlineMustBeFuture: Deadline must be a future time

infoDescription.title: Description
infoDescription.maxCharError: Maximum 2000 characters, including URL address length after file upload

detail.resetTestResultTip: Update the case to 'Pending Test', related statistics and status will be cleared.
detail.firstDataTip: This is already the first record!
detail.lastDataTip: This is already the last record!
detail.requirementTip: Trace issues back to original requirements, helping to understand the background and impact scope of the problem.
detail.storyTip: Trace user perspective description of functional requirements, helping to understand the background and impact scope of the problem.
detail.bugTip: Track errors in software functionality, ensure timely fixes, help identify and resolve systemic issues.
detail.apiTestTip: Establish association with corresponding API test tasks, facilitating tracking of API test progress and ensuring normal interface operation.
detail.scenarioTestTip: Establish association with corresponding scenario test tasks, facilitating understanding of functionality effectiveness in real scenarios and ensuring solution completeness.
detail.taskTip: Record development or testing tasks associated with the current case, helping teams track testing tasks.

caseDetail.creator: Creator
caseDetail.deadlineMustBeFuture: Deadline must be a future time

assocCase.associateCaseTip: "Associated Cases" are used to establish relationships between different cases for easy management and traceability. Cases that can establish associations include: dependent cases, extended cases, same functionality cases, key functionality cases, etc.

list.noReviewsAdded: You haven't added any reviews yet,
list.confirmDeleteReview: Are you sure you want to delete review 「{name}」?
list.reviewDeletedSuccess: Review deleted successfully, you can view the deleted review in the recycle bin

introduce.description: Test case review is a structured check and discussion of cases to improve correctness, completeness, and executability. Reviews typically involve testers, developers, product managers and other stakeholders.

improveQuality.title: Improve Test Case Quality
improveQuality.description: Identify and fix ambiguity, omissions and inconsistencies early to improve quality and maintainability.

ensureCoverage.title: Ensure Test Coverage
ensureCoverage.description: Validate coverage of core functions, edge conditions and business scenarios to reduce missed tests.

findDefects.title: Early Detection of Potential Defects
findDefects.description: Surface potential defects and design issues before execution to cut rework and late-stage fix costs.

promoteKnowledge.title: Promote Knowledge Sharing
promoteKnowledge.description: Share context and best practices to align understanding of requirements and testing intent.

optimizeStrategy.title: Optimize Test Strategy
optimizeStrategy.description: Adjust priorities and execution strategy based on outcomes for more focused use of resources.

reduceRework.title: Reduce Rework Costs
reduceRework.description: Codify review learnings into guidelines and templates to continuously improve authoring and review.

editForm.confirmDeleteReview: Are you sure you want to delete review 「{name}」?
editForm.reviewDeletedSuccess: Review deleted successfully, you can view the deleted review in the recycle bin
editForm.reviewBriefOverview: Review brief overview, supports up to 200 characters
editForm.attachmentsDescription: Support uploading related documents, such as: requirements specification, reference materials, system architecture diagram, test specifications, technical documents, etc. Supported formats: jpg, bmp, png, gif, txt, docx, jpeg, rar, zip, doc, xlsx, xls, pdf; up to 10 attachments can be uploaded.

list.noBaselinesAdded: You haven't added any baselines yet,
list.confirmDeleteBaseline: Are you sure you want to delete baseline 「{name}」?
list.baselineDescription: A baseline is a standard reference point defined and recorded at a specific stage of the software development lifecycle, encompassing functional features and related attributes. Baselines provide a clear framework for testing activities, enabling teams to compare, evaluate, and manage based on unified standards.
list.versionControlDescription: Baselines help teams track and manage functional test cases across different versions, ensuring all team members collaborate based on consistent standards.
list.changeManagementDescription: By establishing baselines, teams can effectively control functional feature changes, ensuring all modifications are confirmed and approved to prevent project chaos.
list.auditComplianceDescription: Baselines provide necessary record snapshots for audit and compliance checks, facilitating verification of transparency and compliance in development and testing processes.

editForm.confirmDeleteBaseline: Are you sure you want to delete baseline 「{name}」?
editForm.baselineDeletedSuccess: Baseline deleted successfully, you can view the deleted baseline in the recycle bin
editForm.baselineBriefOverview: Baseline brief overview, supports up to 200 characters
editForm.baselineBriefOverview2000: Baseline detailed description, supports up to 2000 characters

list.notCreated: Not created yet, click to create

introduce.title: About Analysis
introduce.description: Used to provide real-time test data analysis, promote data-driven decision making, ensure information transparency, enhance team collaboration and issue tracking, and improve project development quality assurance levels. AngusTester provides default analysis templates such as burndown charts, backlog tasks, risk assessment, etc., helping users quickly view dashboards and key performance indicators (KPIs), while users can also customize analysis dashboards based on business focus areas.

editForm.inputAnalysisDescription: Enter analysis description, such as analysis purpose, background, etc., maximum 200 characters
editForm.snapshotData: Save data snapshot, display snapshot data each time

tips.adminOnly: Only administrators and deleters can restore or permanently delete recycle bin data.

empty.hint: Deleted items will be displayed here
